verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Speak <S%H559><s%> to the priests <S%H3548><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, There shall none <S%H3808><s%> be defiled <S%H2930><s%> for the dead <S%H5315><s%> among his people: <S%H5971><s%>

But for his kin, <S%H7607><s%> that is near <S%H7138><s%> to him, that is, for his mother, <S%H517><s%> and for his father, <S%H1><s%> and for his son, <S%H1121><s%> and for his daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and for his brother. <S%H251><s%>

And for his sister <S%H269><s%> a virgin, <S%H1330><s%> that is near <S%H7138><s%> to him, which <S%H834><s%> has had <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> husband; <S%H376><s%> for her may he be defiled. <S%H2930><s%>
But he shall not defile <S%H2930><s%> himself, being a chief <S%H1167><s%> man <S%H1167><s%> among his people, <S%H5971><s%> to profane <S%H2490><s%> himself.

They shall not make baldness <S%H7144><s%> on their head, <S%H7218><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall they shave <S%H1548><s%> off the corner <S%H6285><s%> of their beard, <S%H2206><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> make any cuttings <S%H8296><s%> in their flesh. <S%H1320><s%>

They shall be holy <S%H6918><s%> to their God, <S%H430><s%> and not profane <S%H2490><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of their God: <S%H430><s%> for the offerings of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made by fire, and the bread <S%H3899><s%> of their God, <S%H430><s%> they do offer: <S%H7126><s%> therefore they shall be holy. <S%H6944><s%>

They shall not take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> that is a whore, <S%H2181><s%> or profane; <S%H2491><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall they take <S%H3947><s%> a woman <S%H802><s%> put <S%H1644><s%> away from her husband: <S%H376><s%> for he is holy <S%H6918><s%> to his God. <S%H430><s%>

You shall sanctify <S%H6942><s%> him therefore; for he offers <S%H7126><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of your God: <S%H430><s%> he shall be holy <S%H6918><s%> to you: for I the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which sanctify <S%H6942><s%> you, am holy. <S%H6918><s%>

And the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of any <S%H376><s%> priest, <S%H3548><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> she profane <S%H2490><s%> herself by playing the whore, <S%H2181><s%> she profanes <S%H2490><s%> her father: <S%H1><s%> she shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

And he that is the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> among his brothers, <S%H251><s%> on whose <S%H834><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> was poured, <S%H3332><s%> and that is consecrated <S%H3027><s%> to put <S%H3847><s%> on the garments, <S%H899><s%> shall not uncover <S%H6544><s%> his head, <S%H7218><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> rend <S%H6533><s%> his clothes; <S%H899><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall he go <S%H935><s%> in to any <S%H3605><s%> dead <S%H4191><s%> body, <S%H5315><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> defile <S%H2930><s%> himself for his father, <S%H1><s%> or for his mother; <S%H517><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall he go <S%H3318><s%> out of the sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> profane <S%H2490><s%> the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> of his God; <S%H430><s%> for the crown <S%H5145><s%> of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> of his God <S%H430><s%> is on him: I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And he shall take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> in her virginity. <S%H1331><s%>

A widow, <S%H490><s%> or a divorced <S%H1644><s%> woman, or profane, <S%H2491><s%> or an harlot, <S%H2181><s%> these <S%H428><s%> shall he not take: <S%H3947><s%> but he shall take <S%H3947><s%> a virgin <S%H1330><s%> of his own people <S%H5971><s%> to wife. <S%H802><s%>
Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall he profane <S%H2490><s%> his seed <S%H2233><s%> among his people: <S%H5971><s%> for I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> do sanctify <S%H6942><s%> him.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Whoever <S%H376><s%> <S%H834><s%> he be of your seed <S%H2233><s%> in their generations <S%H1755><s%> that has <S%H1961><s%> any blemish, <S%H3971><s%> let him not approach <S%H7126><s%> to offer <S%H7126><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of his God. <S%H430><s%>

For whatever <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H376><s%> he be that has a blemish, <S%H3971><s%> he shall not approach: <S%H7126><s%> a blind <S%H5787><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a lame, <S%H6455><s%> or <S%H176><s%> he that has a flat <S%H2763><s%> nose, <S%H2763><s%> or <S%H176><s%> any thing superfluous, <S%H8311><s%>
Or <S%H176><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> that is broken footed, <S%H7667><s%> <S%H7272><s%> or <S%H176><s%> broken handed, <S%H7667><s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> hunch back, <S%H1384><s%> or <S%H176><s%> a dwarf, <S%H1851><s%> or <S%H176><s%> that has a blemish <S%H8400><s%> in his eye, <S%H5869><s%> or be scurvy, <S%H1618><s%> or <S%H176><s%> scabbed, <S%H3217><s%> or <S%H176><s%> has his stones <S%H810><s%> broken; <S%H4790><s%>

No man <S%H376><s%> that has a blemish <S%H3971><s%> of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall come <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to offer <S%H7126><s%> the offerings of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made by fire: he has a blemish; <S%H3971><s%> he shall not come <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to offer <S%H7126><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of his God. <S%H430><s%>
He shall eat <S%H398><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of his God, <S%H430><s%> both of the most <S%H6944><s%> holy, <S%H6944><s%> and of the holy. <S%H6944><s%>

Only <S%H389><s%> he shall not go <S%H935><s%> in to the veil, <S%H6532><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> come <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to the altar, <S%H4196><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he has a blemish; <S%H3971><s%> that he profane <S%H2490><s%> not my sanctuaries: <S%H4720><s%> for I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> do sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> told <S%H1696><s%> it to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
